Description_lang: Increases the damage done by your Arcane Missiles spell by $s1%, increases the damage done by your Pyroblast spell by $s2%, and increases the damage done by your Ice Lance spell by $s3%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the damage done by your Arcane Missiles spell by 7%, increases the damage done by your Pyroblast spell by 8%, and increases the damage done by your Ice Lance spell by 12%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 7% el daño que inflige tu hechizo Misiles Arcanos, un 8% el daño que inflige tu hechizo Piroexplosión y un 12% el daño que inflige tu hechizo Lanza de hielo.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 7% o dano causado pelo seu feitiço Mísseis Arcanos, aumenta em 8% o dano causado pelo feitiço Ignimpacto e aumenta em 12% o dano causado pelo seu feitiço Lança de Gelo.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den verursachten Schaden Eures Zaubers 'Arkane Geschosse' um 7%, erhöht den verursachten Schaden Eures Zaubers 'Pyroschlag' um 8% und erhöht den verursachten Schaden Eures Zaubers 'Eislanze' um 12%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the damage done by your Arcane Missiles spell by 7%, increases the damage done by your Pyroblast spell by 8%, and increases the damage done by your Ice Lance spell by 12%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta un 7% el daño que inflige tu hechizo Misiles Arcanos, un 8% el daño que inflige tu hechizo Piroexplosión y un 12% el daño que inflige tu hechizo Lanza de hielo.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente les dégâts infligés par votre sort Projectiles des Arcanes de 7%, ceux infligés par votre sort Explosion pyrotechnique de 8% et ceux infligés par votre sort Javelot de glace de 12%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Missili Arcani del 7%, i danni inflitti da Pirosfera del 8% e i danni inflitti da Lancia di Ghiaccio del 12%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает урон от "Чародейских стрел" на 7%, урон от "Огненной глыбы" на 8% и урон от "Ледяного копья" на 12%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신비한 화살 주문으로 입히는 피해가 7%만큼 증가하고, 불덩이 작렬 주문으로 입히는 피해가 8%만큼 증가하며, 얼음창 주문으로 입히는 피해가 12%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 秘法飛彈造成的傷害提高7%，炎爆術造成的傷害提高8%，冰霜長矛造成的傷害提高12%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的奥术飞弹造成的伤害提高7%，炎爆术造成的伤害提高8%，冰枪术造成的伤害提高12%。
